name: tool_features
schema: CREATE TABLE `tool_features` (`description` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `headline` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `id` TEXT PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT ('r'||lower(hex(randomblob(7)))) NOT NULL, `image` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `image_alt` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `orientation` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `reverse` BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL, `sort_order` NUMERIC DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, `title` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `tool` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `variant` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL)
